item.title: Test Post
item.description: This is just a test post letâ€™s add some libraries: library(Lahman) ## Warning: package 'Lahman' was built under R version 3.4.1 library(dplyr) ## Warning: package 'dplyr' was built under R version 3.4.1 ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union Now how about a query: Batting%>% select(playerID,HR)%>% filter(HR>50) ## Warning: package 'bindrcpp' was built under R version 3.
